metadata.title: memori. - Your All-in-One Learning Platform
metadata.description: Enhance your learning and productivity with memori's comprehensive tools and features.

items.title: Customizable Flashcards
items.description: Create multimedia flashcards with text, images, and audio. Benefit from a spaced repetition system for optimal retention.

items.title: Structured Note-Taking
items.description: Organize notes hierarchically with rich text editing, supporting code snippets and mathematical equations.

items.title: Mind Mapping Tool
items.description: Create visual representations of concepts and collaborate on mind maps in real-time.

items.title: Progress Tracking
items.description: Visualize learning progress, set goals, and get detailed insights on study habits and areas for improvement.

items.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
items.description: Receive personalized learning material suggestions and study schedules based on your progress and goals.

items.title: Customizable Dashboard
items.description: Personalize your dashboard layout with widgets for tracking progress, tasks, and learning resources.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Learning Experience?

dashboard.description: Here you can manage your learning and productivity tasks.
